snippet: A new musical based on Alison Bechdel's graphic novel "Fun Home: A Family Tragicomic," with music by Jeanine Tesori ("Shrek") and book and lyrics by Lisa Kron ("Well"), will open the fall season of the Public Lab series.
abstract: A new musical based on Alison Bechdel's graphic novel "Fun Home: A Family Tragicomic," with music by Jeanine Tesori ("Shrek") and book and lyrics by Lisa Kron ("Well"), will open the fall season of the Public Lab series.

headline.main: 'Fun Home' Musical Comes to the Public Theater
headline.print_headline: Musical to Open Public Lab Series
